text:
Jennifer Poist (born March 14, 1989) is an American wheelchair basketball player. She won a gold medal at the 2016 Summer Paralympics.
She played at the 2011 Women's U25 Wheelchair Basketball World Championship, 2012 Summer Paralympics, 2014 Women's World Wheelchair Basketball Championship, and 2015 Parapan American Games.
She was born in Hanover, Pennsylvania. She lived in McSherrystown, Pennsylvania. She studied at University of Arizona. She is the head coach for women's basketball at the University of Arizona Disability Resource Center.

annotations.surface_form: 2011 Women's U25 Wheelchair Basketball World Championship
